channel.title: Trapped (Source Included - GML Source as well as D&D)
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]Trapped.exe: http://up.ht/dZHuuC Trapped D&D Source: http://up.ht/ghEw3k Trapped GML Source: http://up.ht/ebMsMP[/b][/size](To help others understand the language a bit more)
[u][b]Cheats:[/b][/u] Cheat1: press enter to bring up the password entry box and type "untrapped" to go to the next level. Cheat2: press shift to bring up the password entry box a type "buffedball" to make your character invincible to any of the traps. Walls still kill.
[u][b]About:[/b][/u] A game in which you have to guide the dot through the maze with your mouse without touching the walls or traps.
[u][b]Note:[/b][/u] There is a note in the game information (lacated in the help menu) for Moparscape, YoYo Games, and GameDev. I hope that this game/source will help teach others and that you all enjoy playing it.
[u][b]Images:[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/snapshot1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/trapped_title-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/snapshot2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Trapped (Source Included - GML Source as well as D&D)
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Lol you can make 3D games with it here is a 3D fps I am making. Its not even close to being done but here are the basics. So far it has only one level and only 4 guns to choose from. Just load it from game maker pro and click the green run game button at the top. Its going to be an online fps just like crossfire.

GM Pro Download: http://up.ht/fNZwBs

FPS SOURCE: http://up.ht/fHbKRc

Read full topic
item.source: Trapped (Source Included - GML Source as well as D&D)

item.title: Trapped (Source Included - GML Source as well as D&D)
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:11, topic:387519”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=483321.msg3540372#msg3540372 date=1300823721]

I’m sorry, but how many times do we have to tell you to GTFO with this kind of shit until ya get it?

Stop following the crowd; You don’t know two shits about the language he is using.
[/quote]
Oh yeah, ofcourse! I forgot game maker language was a real game making scripting language! I’m so sorry! Well, now I’m going to make my fantastic 3D game with it. It really will be a hit!

[size=1]/sarcasm[/size][/quote]

tard

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:8, topic:387519”][quote author=someone2 link=topic=483321.msg3540245#msg3540245 date=1300819661]
I’m sorry, but how many times do we have to tell you to GTFO with this kind of shit until ya get it?
[/quote]
Stop following the crowd; You don’t know two shits about the language he is using.[/quote][quote=“jmood128, post:9, topic:387519”]Game Maker Language (GML) is a scripting language developed for use with a computer game creation application called Game Maker.[/quote]

Sorry but i still have to disagree even if it is a “scripting language” i still think it has no real value but this is just my opinion dont let me put you down.

item.title: Trapped (Source Included - GML Source as well as D&D)
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

[size=14pt]Trapped.exe: http://up.ht/dZHuuC
Trapped D&D Source: http://up.ht/ghEw3k
Trapped GML Source: http://up.ht/ebMsMP[/size](To help others understand the language a bit more)

Cheats:
Cheat1: press enter to bring up the password entry box and type “untrapped” to go to the next level.
Cheat2: press shift to bring up the password entry box a type “buffedball” to make your character invincible to any of the traps. Walls still kill.

About:
A game in which you have to guide the dot through the maze with your mouse without touching the walls or traps.

Note:
There is a note in the game information (lacated in the help menu) for Moparscape, YoYo Games, and GameDev. I hope that this game/source will help teach others and that you all enjoy playing it.

Images:
